Healy   Jessica Lessing   Tammy Lo   Nicole Michaels   Kimberly Murphy   Emma Negron   Angela Nelson   Elizabeth Ponchione   Jessica Schafrick   Alex Tang   Diana Wu   Nicole Zeoli     Adjunct Physicians   Administration       open/close   NYU Langone Hospitals & Affiliates   History of Neurosurgery at NYU Langone   The Courage to Cut                                                                      Jessica Lessing, RN, MS, CPNP                                                                    (Pediatric Neurosurgery Outpatient Care and Pediatric Neurosurgery Inpatient Unit)   Jessica Lessing is a board-certified pediatric nurse practitioner with over 10 years of experience providing comprehensive outpatient care. A published author and recognized speaker on adolescent health issues, she is currently pursuing her Master of Science in Nursing as an adult nurse practitioner so that she may continue focusing her interests on the care of her pediatric patients with chronic illness as they age, and on the integration of their multidisciplinary care in a hospital setting. Ms. Lessing earned her Bachelor of Arts degree at the University of Michigan-Ann Arbor with honors as a double major in psychology and sociology, and was accepted into Alpha Kappa Delta, the international honor society, upon graduation. She went on to receive her Bachelor and Master of Science in Nursing degrees as a pediatric nurse practitioner from Columbia University, and was accepted into Sigma Theta Tau, the international honor society in nursing. Giving                                          Home / People                                              Brian R Lessing , FSA, MAAA Adjunct Professor Finance & Risk Engineering Email: brl255@nyu.edu  Profile  Biography Brian Lessing is a Senior Director and Actuary at AXA Equitable Life Insurance Company, with responsibilities in life insurance pricing and product development, actuarial review of contracts, prospectuses and marketing materials, preparation of actuarial memoranda for state filings, and actuarial specifications for administrative and proposal systems. In addition, he has been active on industry committees working on emerging insurance-related issues. He received an AB in Mathematics from Princeton University and MS in Mathematics from the Courant Institute at NYU. He holds the Chartered Life Underwriter (CLU) designation, and is a Fellow of the Society of Actuaries (FSA).
